By Kurasu Soratobu on Sunday, January 8, 2006 - 12:35 pm:

I know. I know. Disappear for a year or so, come back, and expect things out of people. I should be ashamed of myself.

Anyway, hello. I don't know if I'm back regular-like (I don't get to play MR much any more since my PS2 died and I've been trying to get a new one with no cash) but I'm at least looking back in to say 'hello'. And that I'm still around, and still available for people who want to gab. Need to come to the chats more often.

But the main reason I'm posting here is that while going through Wikipedia one day, I happened to notice that it doesn't have an entry for Monster Rancher the game. Or rather it does, but it's empty at the moment. This can't be allowed! So I'm stacking together some basic information to be able to put together an entry, maybe.

What I want to ask is A) Is there someone on the board who might know more about Wiki entries than I do, or will I just have to get it together the hard way? And B) mostly to Lisa, obviously, do you mind if one of Wikipedia's links is to good ol' MRM? The information on there is mostly going to be basic and clinical, after all; if they want actual help on the game, they're going to need to go _somewhere_. ;)
